Package service

Class BorrowerService

java.lang.Object
service.BorrowerService
public class BorrowerService extends Object
Service class that manages borrower-related operations such as loading borrowed media data, generating overdue reports, paying fines, and displaying borrowed items.

This service interacts with BorrowRecordDAO and FineDAO to retrieve and update borrower information.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Library Management System

  • Method Details

    • loadBorrowerData

      public void loadBorrowerData(Borrower borrower)
      Loads a borrower's currently borrowed media items and fine balance.
      Parameters:
      borrower - The borrower whose data will be loaded.

    • generateOverdueReport

      public void generateOverdueReport(Borrower borrower)
      Generates and prints a detailed overdue report for the borrower, including overdue days and calculated fines.
      Parameters:
      borrower - The borrower for whom the overdue report is generated.

    • payFine

      public boolean payFine(Borrower borrower, double amount)
      Processes a fine payment for a borrower.
      Parameters:
      borrower - The borrower making the payment.
      amount - The payment amount.
      Returns:
      true if the payment is successful, false otherwise.

    • displayBorrowedMedia

      public void displayBorrowedMedia(Borrower borrower)
      Displays all currently borrowed media items for a borrower. Includes overdue warnings when applicable.
      Parameters:
      borrower - The borrower whose borrowed media will be displayed.
